shapes

Class Star

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Shape
      • shapes.Circle
        • shapes.RegularPolygon
          • shapes.Star
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Translatable, UniformScalable

    public class Star
extends RegularPolygon
    Represents a Star on the canvas. It extends RegularPolygon by an inner radius (making the inherited radius the outer radius). The inner and outer radius determine the distance of the inner and outer vertices to the center respectively. This implementation of Star is equilateral and non-intersecting, but not equiangular.
    See Also:
    RegularPolygon, Circle, Shape, Serialized Form
